availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Washington Adair (Nicholas County, KY, dentist)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, dentist. Kentucky native. Son of Richard Adair and Mary Adair. Married to Mary H. Adair. Resident in Nicholas County in 1850. Dentist in Nicholas County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 412A
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 277B
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Nicholas County, KY, July 1863, p. 6, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
